item.title: Danny Yagan - About
item.description:
Curriculum vitae.

Positions: Robert D. Burch Associate Professor of Economics at the University of California, Berkeley; Director of the Burch Center for Tax Policy and Public Finance; Research Associate of the Public Economics Program at the National Bureau of Economic Research; Member of the Conference on Research in Income and Wealth at the National Bureau of Economic Research; Co-founder and Chief Economist of The Budget Lab at Yale; Co-editor of the Journal of Public Economics; and member of the Board of Editors of American Economic Review: Insights.
